items.title: Make up to 250 cuts with Greenworks’ 40V 18-inch high power cordless chainsaw kit at a new $255 low
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Greenworks 40V High Power 18-inch Cordless Chainsaw Kit with a 5.0Ah HP battery and 5A rapid charger at $255 shipped, which beats out the direct website pricing, where it is still being offered for its full $300 MSRP. This is a newer electric cutting solution from Greenworks that has been on the market since June, though we’ve seen very few discounts on it in the months since then. We’ve only spotted it going as low as $288, with the $45 markdown here taking things further than ever to a new all-time low price.

items.title: Solve commuting needs while saving on storage space with MOD’s City 3 folding e-bikes at $1,799 lows
items.summary:
As part of MOD Bikes’ ongoing New Year Sale, which is continuing to offer rare price cuts of up to $400 across its e-bike lineup, you have a little more time left to hop on the City 3 Folding e-bike at $1,799 shipped, or its City+ Step-Thru 3 Folding e-bike at $1,799 shipped. These two variations of the brand’s folding commuter have spent much of the last year keeping to their $1,999 MSRPs, with discounts having only ever taken as much as $200 off at a time, whereas alternate models (mostly the SideCar e-bikes) have seen much larger discounts. There’s no telling when we’ll see another sale after this one ends, as the brand has been lessening them, so for the time that’s left, you can save $200 and get either at the best price we have tracked. You can also browse the full MOD New Year Sale lineup here.

items.title: How to score Samsung’s Galaxy Watch Ultra at a giant $379 off the orig. price
items.summary:
We spotted at least $175 off the latest 2025 Galaxy Watch Ultra this morning. That deal is still live, but as you likely have seen folks talking about online, it is largely the same as the 2024 model save for some extra RAM under the hood and the new blue colorway. Another big difference is the price and Best Buy is now offering “excellent” condition units on the 2024 model at a giant $379 off the original list price.

items.title: Razer’s Joro portable wireless gaming keyboard just hit a new all-time low at $91
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Razer’s Joro portable wireless compact gaming keyboard down to $91 shipped. This particular model hit the scene last year alongside the brand’s Clio head cushion and Basilisk Mobile mouse carrying a $140 price tag. It has lately been fetching $130 at Amazon, but today’s deal shaves an additional $39 off its usual going rate to mark a new best price to beat. This is a timed Lightning deal and it’s already starting to go quick, so be sure to grab it while you can before the price jumps back. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Nvidia brings its G-Sync Pulsar tech to four monitors, which reduces motion blur by using a "rolling scan" scheme that briefly pulses the monitors' backlight (Kyle Orland/Ars Technica)
items.summary:
Kyle Orland / Ars Technica:
Nvidia brings its G-Sync Pulsar tech to four monitors, which reduces motion blur by using a “rolling scan” scheme that briefly pulses the monitors' backlight  —  Four new monitors promise “effective motion clarity of a theoretical 1,000 Hz monitor.”

items.title: ESR’s MagMouse with built-in USB-C cable snaps to MacBooks and iPads, now at $20 Amazon all-time low
items.summary:
Courtesy of ESR’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score its latest MagMouse in white for $19.99 Prime shipped. Folks without a Prime membership can dodge the shipping fee by checking out with items worth over $35 in the cart. This model launched last year at $24 with early-bird offers on Kickstarter, shortly after which it landed on Amazon carrying a $36 price tag. The white one has lately been fetching $30 at Amazon, and today’s deal shaves $10 off its usual going rate to land it $4 below its early bird launch price. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this mouse, and you can learn more about it below.

more…
